form.label: Organic
form.description: Inspired by natural curves and flowing shapes.

form.label: Geometric
form.description: Based on clean lines and shapes like circles and triangles.

form.label: Asymmetric
form.description: Uneven, unexpected shapes with deliberate imbalance.

styleIntensity.label: Minimal
styleIntensity.description: Extremely simple and clean design with few elements.

styleIntensity.label: Balanced
styleIntensity.description: Well-composed and visually pleasant without being flashy.

styleIntensity.label: Striking
styleIntensity.description: Bold and eye-catching, standing out in design.

styleIntensity.label: Showy
styleIntensity.description: Intended to dazzle with extravagant or decorative elements.

eraStyle.label: Antique
eraStyle.description: Inspired by ancient styles and motifs.

eraStyle.label: Vintage
eraStyle.description: Reflects nostalgic styles from the 1920s to 1980s.

eraStyle.label: Modern
eraStyle.description: Sleek and clean designs reflecting current trends.

eraStyle.label: Trendy
eraStyle.description: Highly current and in vogue, based on popular looks.

eraStyle.label: Futuristic
eraStyle.description: Advanced, non-traditional, and sci-fi inspired designs.

usagePurpose.label: Daily
usagePurpose.description: Designed for everyday use and comfort.

usagePurpose.label: Elegant
usagePurpose.description: For special occasions with graceful simplicity.

usagePurpose.label: Night
usagePurpose.description: Made for night outings or parties.

usagePurpose.label: Ceremony
usagePurpose.description: Used for formal or ceremonial occasions.

usagePurpose.label: Conceptual
usagePurpose.description: Abstract or themed designs with bold artistic intention.

stoneEmphasis.label: Strong
stoneEmphasis.description: Gemstone is a major visual focus.

stoneEmphasis.label: Dominant
stoneEmphasis.description: The entire design centers around one or more bold stones.
